stimulusHtml: The inscription “Agrippa” in the entablature frieze was included most likely to reference the

features.html: © Scala / Art Resource, NY

choicesHtml: emperor who led a victorious campaign over invading armies
consul who had commissioned an earlier structure on the site
wife of the emperor who is buried in the crypt beneath the building
plague that killed thousands and was the incentive for creating the building
